hyp_text: USA Gymnastics supported an investigation to find out what led to the abuse of another person, a man or woman, that happened a long time ago and now the people involved have received this kind of heavy sentence from Larry Nassar, who said so and will make the others who did similar things feel guilty and strict.

[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Tok Pisin]: Long planti 'century' i go pinis, ol manmeri i bin bildim ol fletpela eria long ol ples we i no stret, ol ples we i sanap i go antap i go long 'cliff' we i lukluk i go long solwara.

[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Tok Pisin]: Taim em i stat i kam inap nau, The Onion i kamap olsem wanpela pablikesen bilong mekim fani long nius, wantaim wanpela niuspepa, wanpela websait we i kisim 5,000,000 kainkain visita insait long mun bilong Oktoba, ol 'personal ads', wanpela 24 aua nius, ol 'podcast', na wanpela soim wanpela 'world atlas' we ol i kolim olsem Our Dumb World.

hyp_text: This wheel is spinning on the ground all the time. A big thing is that the wheel makes for us our transportation, which we use every day.
prompt:
<|begin_of_text|><|start_header_id|>system<|end_header_id|>

[Tok Pisin]: Maski long dispela, olgeta lain long Belgium na Switzerland we i save yusim French i save lainim 'standard French' insait long skul, olsem na ol bai i inap long save maski yu yusim namba sistem bilong 'standard French'.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Tok Pisin]: Long planti 'century' i go pinis, ol manmeri i bin bildim ol fletpela eria long ol ples we i no stret, ol ples we i sanap i go antap i go long 'cliff' we i lukluk i go long solwara.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Tok Pisin]: 800-pela 'miles' bilong dispela Trans-Alaska Pipeline System em ol i bin pasim bihain long 'crude oil' i bin kapsait long tausenpela dram long hap saut bilong Fairbanks, long Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Tok Pisin]: Ol sampelaa hap bilong Belgiun long tude i bin stap olsem hap bilong Luxembourg long bipo, tasol em i kamap ol hap bilong Belgium bihain long Belgian Revolution we i kamap long ol yia insait long 1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Tok Pisin]: Taim em i stat i kam inap nau, The Onion i kamap olsem wanpela pablikesen bilong mekim fani long nius, wantaim wanpela niuspepa, wanpela websait we i kisim 5,000,000 kainkain visita insait long mun bilong Oktoba, ol 'personal ads', wanpela 24 aua nius, ol 'podcast', na wanpela soim wanpela 'world atlas' we ol i kolim olsem Our Dumb World.

src_text: Na tu, namel long wanwan 'dynasty' i gat taim we ol provins i stap ol yet. Wanpela bilong ol dispela taim we planti lain i save long en em taim bilong Three Kingdom we i stap long 60-pela yia namel long Han na Jin Dynasty.
ref_text: Also between each dynasty was an unstable age of divided provinces. The best-known of these periods was the Three Kingdoms epoch taking place for 60 years between the Han and the Jin Dynasty.
hyp_text: And then, one of the dynasties had a time when the provinces were still unsettled. One of the dynasties of that time, the Three Kingdom period, lasted for 60 years, from the Han to the Jin Dynasty.
